In England, in the seven days to 02 February, there were 530,802 new confirmed cases (938.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 January, there were 623,371 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 15% (92,569 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 February is 15,331,148 (27,110.7 cases per 100,000 population).
